title: Updated 3A XL to android 10 no mobile network
content:
Updated as above, it says phone not allowed for voice. Network is in U.K. With BT (used to be EE).
Tried another bt sim and still no calls possible. The old sim works ok in another phone. 
Factory reset the phone still the same. 
In mobile network settings, it shows as BT.
In about phone looking in sim status network and phone number are unknown, mobile state is disconnected.
Had a google chat, they checked various things and have offered me to exchange the phone FOC.
But it worked fine before update so surely is a software problem???
Any help appreciated. Thanks
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
